frontmatter.title: Open Fabric
frontmatter.description: Building a payment platform from scratch

metadata.business-context: Payment startup needed to build a secure, scalable platform from scratch
metadata.solution: Developed a multi-tenant cloud platform that connects merchants with payment providers
metadata.outcome: Successfully launched the platform within one year, enabling expansion in Southeast Asia
